title: Whitechapel - Mark Of The Blade (EP) 2016 ak
description:
Whitechapel - Mark Of The Blade (EP) 2016 ak

Whitechapel is an American deathcore band from Knoxville, Tennessee. The band is named after the Whitechapel district in East London, England, referencing the series of murders committed by Jack the Ripper. 
The group comprises vocalist Phil Bozeman, guitarists Ben Savage, Alex Wade, and Zach Householder, bassist Gabe Crisp, and drummer Ben Harclerode. Founded in 2006 by Bozeman and Savage, the band has released five studio albums, five music videos and are currently signed to Metal Blade Records. 

Whitechapel's 2010 album A New Era of Corruption, sold around 10,600 copies in the United States in its first week of release and debuted at position No. 43 on the Billboard 200 chart. The band's self-titled fourth album was released on June 19, 2012 and debuted at No. 47 on the Billboard 200, selling roughly 9,200 copies in its first week. 

Then on May 2nd 2016 an EP was created. Made solid by the first track from the upcoming album with its June release date "Mark of The Blade" (aka: FUCK The DMCA Bastards) proves once more that this band has lots left and the Fall tour will be heavier than ever.

Tracklist

01  Blacked Out.mp3
02  I Dementia  (Live).mp3
03  Fall Of The Hypocrites (Bonus Track).mp3
04  This Is Exile (Live) (Bonus Track).mp3
05. Mark Of The Blade.mp3
